body_html: @SsnL I looked at the code for downcastOuter/inner and I'd rather not remove them in this PR because there are a lot of (also obsolete, I believe) functions that call them and it'll take a while to figure out everything that can be deleted. I'll save that for another PR

body: @SsnL I looked at the code for `downcastOuter/inner` and I'd rather not remove them in this PR because there are a lot of (also obsolete, I believe) functions that call them and it'll take a while to figure out everything that can be deleted. I'll save that for another PR
